name: dullsville
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very boring place or situation: He played 1960s-style blues rock that was a one-way ticket to dullsville. His holiday destination of choice seems to be Dullsville.
More examplesFewer examplesOur neighbors invited us round to their house for an evening in dullsville. I have to admit that there have been times at parties when I've taken fellow guests on a conversational journey to Dullsville.

very boring: Most political conventions are dullsville. I never thought I would spend my life having dullsville meetings about sales figures.
More examplesFewer examplesIf I just agreed with everyone else and never wrote anything provocative, this blog would soon become dullsville.I could hardly be bothered to watch the show through to its dullsville conclusion.
